name: 大分・別府ミステリー案内 歪んだ竹灯篭
name_original: 大分・別府ミステリー案内 歪んだ竹灯篭
description:
The Third retro-style travel mystery adventure!
This game is a suspense command ADV set in Ooita Beppu region in Japan.
You and your partner, detective Ken, will chase the truth behind suspense mystery.

Travel through Beppu with your trusty partner “Detective Ken” to unwind the mystery surrounding the Anan family, renowned for their intricate bamboo craft. Get to know the head of the family “Souichiro”, his wife “Midori”, a fresh-faced creator “Fumiko” and the ryokan worker “Tokiko” as they unfold a story full of drama and suspense……

Character design is by the comic artist Arai Kiyokazu, who also worked on the first two games in the series.

■Feature■
-It is an old-type command adventure.
Get clues to solve the case by talking to the characters and
and solve the case.

-The story is based on Oita Prefecture in Japan.
You can feel the atmosphere of Oita, a city famous for its hot springs, from the game.

-The characters were designed by Mr. Kiyokazu Arai.
